metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13638 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: GNU patch through 2.7.6 is vulnerable to OS shell command injection that can be exploited by opening a crafted patch file that contains an ed style diff payload with shell metacharacters. The ed editor does not need to be present on the vulnerable system. This is different from CVE-2018-1000156.

criterions.comment: patch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
